description: Number of matrices with n columns whose rows do not cover each other. Also antichain covers of an unlabeled n-set.
references: V. Jovovic and G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6)
V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On enumeration of the class of all monotone Boolean functions, in preparation.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: Micha Hofri (hofri(AT)cs.rice.edu)
extensions: a(7) from A003182. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 13 2015
